_header: From all manner thieves and untrue men
_description: A charm against thieves — twelve couplets and two Latin quatrains

BodLauMis685.First Lines:
ffro al maner the vys and vntrewmencrist in heuyn þou me
                    deffende…
BodLauMis685.Last Lines:
…They tak the theuys & bynd hem fast & do them no
                    foreAs dyd Saynt Bartylmew þe fend with her of Berd so
                    hore
